ir:
For the constructor function.
- the state variable owner will be updated to 0x6fDb012E4a57623eA74Cc1a6E5095Cda63f2C767.
- the state variable owner1 will be updated to 0xf62f85457f97CE475AAa5523C5739Aa8d4ba64C1.
- the state variable owner2 will be updated to 0xf62f85457f97CE475AAa5523C5739Aa8d4ba64C1.
- the state variable price will be updated to 0x2386f26fc10000.

For the payable fallback function.
- When the ether just received (i.e., msg.value) is 0:
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/10) to owner.
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/100) to owner1.
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/100) to owner2.
  - When the showdeposit of caller is 0:
    - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
    - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
  - When the showdeposit of caller is not 0:
    - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*400)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
      - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
      - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x22b1c8c1227a00000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*500)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0xde0b6b3a7640000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x8ac7230489e80000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*425)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x8ac7230489e80000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x1158e460913d00000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*450)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x1158e460913d00000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x22b1c8c1227a00000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*475)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
- When the ether just received (i.e., msg.value) is not 0, and the ether just received (i.e., msg.value) is not smaller than price:
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/10) to owner.
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/100) to owner1.
  - it transfers (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)/100) to owner2.
  - When the showdeposit of caller is 0:
    - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
    - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
  - When the showdeposit of caller is not 0:
    - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*400)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
      - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
      - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x22b1c8c1227a00000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*500)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0xde0b6b3a7640000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x8ac7230489e80000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*425)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x8ac7230489e80000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x1158e460913d00000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*450)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
    - When 0x1158e460913d00000 is not greater than the showdeposit of caller, and 0x22b1c8c1227a00000 is greater than the showdeposit of caller:
      - it transfers ether valued ((((the showdeposit of caller*475)/10000)*(the current block's number-the showlastchange of caller))/5900) to caller. Afterthat, 
        - the showlastchange of caller will be updated to the current block's number.
        - the showdeposit of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the showdeposit of caller).
